price: Monsi akan nkͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn bͻnefakyε no mu, nhwehwԑ Aheman a ne tεtrεtε bεyε sε ͻsoro ne asaase tεtrεtε a yɛasiesie ama wͻn a wͻagye Nyankopͻn ne Ne somafoͻ no die no. Woi yε Nyankopͻn adom, Ɔde ma obi a Ɔpε. Na Nyankopͻn ne Adom Kεseε no Wura no.
arabic: سَابِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: sābiqū ilā maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarḍuhā kaʿarḍi al-samāi wal-arḍi uʿiddat lilladhīna āmanū bil-lahi warusulihi dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
